## stringEscapeHtml variable

字符串编码 HTML

**Signature:**

```typescript
stringEscapeHtml: (html: string) => string;
```

## Example

```js
stringEscapeHtml('<b>You & Me speak "xixi"</b>');
// => "&lt;b&gt;You &amp; Me speak &quot;xixi&quot;&lt;/b&gt;"
```
